pullrequest.title: Changes to Doxygen comments and formatting PART 3: sdf, sensors, transport

content.raw:
Made some more changes. 

FYI: Using three forward slashes (///) is automatically interpreted as valid doxygen documentation. So "/// Documentation inherited" will replace the actual inherited documentation with "Documentation inherited". The solution is to use only two forward slashes.
content.html:
Made some more changes.

FYI: Using three forward slashes (///) is automatically interpreted as valid doxygen documentation. So "/// Documentation inherited" will replace the actual inherited documentation with "Documentation inherited". The solution is to use only two forward slashes.
